thread.title: BRIEF-Avangrid Announces Delayed Filing Of Annual Report On Form 10-K

title: BRIEF-Avangrid Announces Delayed Filing Of Annual Report On Form 10-K
text: March 16, 2018 / 8:35 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Avangrid Announces Delayed Filing Of Annual Report On Form 10-K Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Avangrid Inc: * AVANGRID ANNOUNCES DELAYED FILING OF ANNUAL REPORT ON FORM 10-K * AVANGRID INC SAYS REAFFIRMS PRELIMINARY 2017 RESULTS ANNOUNCED IN AVANGRIDâ€™S PRESS RELEASE ISSUED ON FEBRUARY 20 * AVANGRID INC SAYS WILL BE DELAYED IN FILING ANNUAL REPORT ON FORM 10-K FOR FY 2017, BEYOND EXTENDED DEADLINE OF MARCH 16 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
